data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Mpumalanga, South Africa a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mpumalanga, South Africa
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Mpumalanga, South Africa to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Mpumalanga, South Africa to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Mpumalanga, South Africa. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, English-speaking people.
Spirit, help every believer in Mpumalanga, South Africa be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 782,270 lost people in  Mpumalanga, South Africa have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Mpumalanga do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Mpumalanga
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Egyptian, Mauritian, South Asian, Telugu-speaking, Somali, Tamil (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Egyptian (60,000), Mauritian (42,000), South Asian, Telugu-speaking (4,900), Somali (24,000), Tamil (Hindu traditions) (32,000)
